tool_description: Analyzes course schedules to identify and report scheduling conflicts including instructor overlaps, room double-booking, and student enrollment conflicts.

schedule_data.description: Complete schedule information for conflict analysis

error_messages: Invalid schedule format: schedule_data must contain properly formatted schedule entries.
Empty schedule data: At least one schedule entry is required for conflict detection.
Malformed schedule entry: One or more schedule entries are missing required information.
usage: Provide schedule_data with complete course, time, room, and instructor information. Use boolean flags to control which types of conflicts to detect.

conflict_resolution_suggestions.description: Suggested actions to resolve detected conflicts
